question: India's first-ever aviation university will come up in which state?
explanation: The Rajiv Gandhi National Aviation University (RGNAU), which is Indiaâ€™s first-ever aviation university, will soon be inaugurated at Fursatganj in Rae Bareli, Uttar Pradesh.
